summary: Provides utilities to trim and filter spatial line and point datasets so that they fit within the active cells of a MODFLOW‑6 grid. It handles various data structures (GeoDataFrames, xarray DataArrays, XUGrid objects) and includes logic to remove geometry intersecting inactive cells and to convert between line and polygon representations for head‑flow‑boundary data.
business_intent: Enables modelers to preprocess spatial input data by restricting it to the model domain, ensuring that only relevant active cells are considered and improving downstream simulation accuracy and efficiency.
